txt.en:
After encountering the elusive frost-grim, Kurzkub, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

As you inspect Kurzkub's shard, you wonder if any fell sorcery was involved in moulding this strange object.

You decide to bring this trophy to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards, so that it might be preserved once Gundabad is reclaimed.
Deliver Kurzkub's shard to Belga Defthand at Steepset
Belga Defthand can be found at Steepset in MÃ¡ttugard.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Gundabad. You should deliver it to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards.
After encountering the elusive frost-grim, Kurzkub, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

'What have you brought me now?'

Belga Defthand inspects Kurzkub's shard closely, holding it up to the light at Steepset.

'Ah, this shall make a fine trophy! I shall preserve this rare find. Let us hope fewer of these fell spirits haunt the Mountain-hold in days to come.'
